participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, with a passion for music and photography.
participant_1.background: I love to listen to music while I'm working on my photography projects. I had to give up my two dogs when I moved, but I'm excited to get a new puppy when I settle in. I do not like my job. I enjoyed a nice walk outside to appreciate the weather. I enjoy a nice cup of coffee while listening to records on my record player.

participant_2.name: Ava
participant_2.personality: Active and artistic with a fascination for cars and a vibrant inner world.
participant_2.background: I keep fit by drinking a lot of tea and practicing my sport. When it rains, I put on my headphones, grab a cup of coffee, and lose myself in my sketch book. Watching sports is fun. My internal arguments are often more interesting than my conversations with others. I'm a car enthusiast searching for a quiet, private home with plenty of space for my vintage cars.

content.text: It was a beautiful day today, so I went on a nice walk and enjoyed a cup of coffee. What was your day like?
I was pretty tired today. I worked out and then I sketched for hours.
I used to love to sketch, but I haven't had time in a while.
I find it relaxing. I just put on a podcast or music and lose myself in the drawing.
I do love listening to music while I'm working.
What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I'm really into rock and alternative music.
I'm more into jazz and classical, but I appreciate all kinds of music.
I've been wanting to get into jazz, but I don't know much about it.
It can be a little hard to get into, but once you do, it's really rewarding.
I'll have to give it a try.
